scripts.ken-js/_build: cd packages/ken-js && npm install && npm run build && cd ../..
scripts.ken-explorer/_build: cd packages/ken-explorer && npm run build && cd ../..
scripts.ken-explorer/build: echo [Begin Build] && npm run bootstrap && echo [Bootstrap Complete] && npm run ken-js/_build && echo [ken-js-build complete] && npm run ken-explorer/_build
